>>Weather Fergana

The current atmospheric condition in Fergana is recognized as a regional steppe climate. During the year, there is little rainfall in Fergana. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as BSk. The mean yearly temperature recorded in Fergana is 15.3 °C | 59.5 °F, as per the available data. Annually, approximately 308 mm | 12.1 inch of precipitation descends.

Fergana are in the northern hemisphere. Summer starts here at the end of June and ends in September. There are the months of summer: June, July, August, September. The best time to visit is June, July, August.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Fergana

In terms of precipitation, the month with the lowest amount of rainfall is August, recording a mere 7 mm | 0.3 inch in its entirety. This denotes an exceptionally dry period within that particular time frame. Most precipitation falls in April, with an average of 45 mm | 1.8 inch.

average temperature by month Fergana

The month that experiences the highest temperatures throughout the year is referred to as July, where an average temperature of 29.0 °C | 84.2 °F prevails. In January, the average temperature is 1.7 °C | 35.1 °F. It is the lowest average temperature of the whole year.

There exists a variation of 38 mm | 1 inch in precipitation levels between the month with the least rainfall and that which experiences maximum downpour. The average temperatures vary during the year by 27.3 °C | 49.1 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is December (67.03 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (29.75 %). The month with the highest number of rainy days is April (9.47 days). The month with the lowest number of rainy days is September (1.90 days).
